about_the_game:
Game objectives

After a storm left an island, everything is scattered to different positions, your objectives are to pick up and deliver objects to their original positions.

Explore Hidden Object

  • To know the original position of objects, player move to touch to active the hollow stars (there are 5) which carved on the island.
  • An active hollow star will shine upon the original position of 5 objects.
  • Player will look at the entire island and pickup the objects and deliver it to the original position.

Cozy Adventure

Relax yourself in this little adventure to different locations. Meet new friends at new islands. Have a talk or do a quest.

Features

  • Action Hidden Object
  • NPC side story along your journey.
  • Multiple level which increase in difficulty.

Game Objectives

Game objectives summary in short description, hope you will find it easier to understand:

  • An island have objects (tree, fruits, grass, chair...) on it.
  • A storm rampaged the island and make objects on the island to scatters to different position.
  • Player's objectives are to move objects to their original positions.
  • To know the original position of objects, player move to touch to active the hollow stars (there are 5) which carved on the island.
  • An active hollow star will shine upon the original position of 5 objects.
  • Player will look at the entire island and pickup the objects and deliver it to the original position.
